implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Acts as the program entrypoint. Sets up logging, instantiates the UserService, fetches all users, displays them, and handles/reports errors.
implementation.name: main
implementation.pseudo_code:
Call setup_logging()
Create UserService instance
TRY
    users = user_service.fetch_all_users()
    display_users(users)
EXCEPT Exception as e
    Log error 'Failed to retrieve users: {e}'

missing_implementations: Graceful handling and user-facing reporting of non-200 HTTP responses and connection errors in the main program (currently, errors are logged but not reported to the user in a user-friendly way).
